review: I purchased a Chromecast on day one, and I have to say this is one of the best tech investments I've made in a while. The UI is simple and just works! After showing what it can do to my family and friends, they all want at least one and maybe more. If you're on the fence about buying a Chromecast, don't be! Get it!
